content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->3->4->6

Note: The provided graph has been interpreted as an undirected graph, so the edges are represented as pairs of nodes. The shortest path from node 4 (the starting point) to node 6 (the target point) is 1->2->3->4->6.

6->3->4->7

Note: The provided graph has been interpreted as an undirected graph, so the edges are represented as pairs of nodes. The shortest path from node 4 (the starting point) to node 6 (the end point) is 6->3->4->7.
